title: Lover
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:14.87] We could leave the Christmas lights up 'til January
[00:21.55] And this is our place, we make the rules
[00:27.68] And there's a dazzling haze, a mysterious way about you dear
[00:35.74] Have I known you 20 seconds or 20 years?
[00:41.82] Can I go where you go?
[00:48.82] Can we always be this close forever and ever?
[00:55.58] And ah, take me out, and take me home
[01:02.97] You're my, my, my, my
[01:09.14] Lover
[01:12.57] 
[01:17.96] We could let our friends crash in the living room
[01:25.05] This is our place, we make the call
[01:30.84] And I'm highly suspicious that everyone who sees you wants you
[01:37.70] I've loved you three summers now, honey, but I want 'em all
[01:45.06] Can I go where you go?
[01:51.91] Can we always be this close forever and ever?
[01:58.67] And ah, take me out, and take me home (forever and ever)
[02:05.93] You're my, my, my, my
[02:12.28] Lover
[02:13.31] Ladies and gentlemen, will you please stand?
[02:16.65] With every guitar string scar on my hand
[02:20.22] I take this magnetic force of a man to be my lover
[02:26.81] My heart's been borrowed and yours has been blue
[02:30.47] All's well that ends well to end up with you
[02:34.06] Swear to be overdramatic and true to my lover
[02:41.05] And you'll save all your dirtiest jokes for me
[02:47.11] And at every table, I'll save you a seat, lover
[02:55.17] Can I go where you go?
[03:01.72] Can we always be this close forever and ever?
[03:09.19] And ah, take me out, and take me home (forever and ever)
[03:16.13] You're my, my, my, my
[03:22.32] Oh, you're my, my, my, my
[03:29.37] Darling, you're my, my, my, my
[03:36.39] Lover
[03:37.39]
